title: Google keeps crashing Pixel 4a5g
content:
I am using a new pixel 4a5g that I just got this week
While setting up today I started having problems with the google search. 
Every time I open the search it crashes after a few seconds.
I tried all the fixes I could find including clearing the cache and storage all the way to safe mode and deleting apps, but nothing seems to work
Any help fixing this would be appreciated as this is very frustrating for a new phone
